nodes.text: Bok Yost was a male administrator who rigged an election on Elegasso to earn his post. He suspected that the rogue stormtrooper group Hand of Judgment would seek to stop him and laid a trap for them. While he successfully captured them and planned to turn them in as Imperial deserters, they were rescued by the Emperor's Hand, Mara Jade, who slew his mercenaries and compelled his resignation in favor of holding new, fair elections.
